data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Narmada, Gujarat, India be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Narmada, Gujarat, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Narmada, Gujarat, India, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Narmada, Gujarat, India. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Jesus, help the church in the county of Narmada to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Shenva (Hindu traditions) people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, help the 6,493 believers in Narmada to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the county of Narmada who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 6,493 believers in the county of Narmada the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

location.name: Narmada
location.people_groups_list: Vaghri (Muslim traditions), Galiara, Gandharb (Muslim traditions), Mussali, Shemalia
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Vaghri (Muslim traditions) (22,000), Galiara (400), Gandharb (Muslim traditions) (5,500), Mussali (10,000), Shemalia (2,800)
